question: Who posted the most-liked tweet last year?

content.source_1:
Top 30
The following table lists the top 30 most-liked tweets on X, the account that posted it, the total number of likes rounded down to the nearest hundred thousand, and the date it was originally posted. Posts that have an identical number of likes are listed in date order with the most recent post ranked highest. The notes provide the details surrounding the post.

1
 [It is with immeasurable grief that we confirm the passing of Chadwick Boseman. Chadwick was diagnosed with stage III colon cancer in 2016, and battled with it these last 4 years as it progressed to stage IV... ] [6]
Tweet announcing the death of American actor Chadwick Boseman. Boseman died after complications with colon cancer, which he had been diagnosed with four years prior; the diagnosis was only made public after his death.[7] It became the most-liked tweet in the history of Twitter within 24 hours of its being posted, and was the most-liked tweet of 2020.[8]
Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg tweeted this in response to British-American internet personality Andrew Tate, who posted a tweet taunting her with the emissions of his car collection.[16]
Kobe was a legend on the court and just getting started in what would have been just as meaningful a second act. To lose Gianna is even more heartbreaking to us as parents. Michelle and I send love and prayers to Vanessa and the entire Bryant family on an unthinkable day.[24]
 Following Andrew Tate's arrest in Romania, there was a debunked[27] rumor that the authorities arrested Tate because a video he posted taunting Thunberg included a pizza box from a Romanian pizzeria, indicating he was in the country.[28][29]
BTS member Jungkook posted a selfie featuring his newly dyed blond hair.[34] The tweet surpassed 1 million likes in 58 minutes.[35]
content.source_2:
Statista R identifies and awards industry leaders, top providers, and exceptional brands through exclusive rankings and top lists in collaboration with renowned media brands worldwide.
 For more details, visit our website.
 X/Twitter: most popular tweets as of 2023
The most liked tweet of all time was posted on American Actor Chadwick Boseman's Twitter account by his family members in August 2020 after his passing. As of January 2023, the post had seven million likes. Ranking second was a tweet by Elon Musk from April 2022, suggesting he would purchase Coca-Cola. Former U.S. President Barack Obama's 2017 tweet which stated "No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin or his background or his religion..." has gained four million likes and 1.4 million retweets.
 Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg had two top ranking tweets as of January 2023. Ranking forth, a tweet from Thunberg which was published on December 27th 2022, was a response to American-British media personality Andrew Tate. Tate tweeted Greta and requested an email address to which he could submit a list of his collection of cars and each one's corresponding emissions, resulting in Thunberg's comeback gaining almost four million likes within a matter of days.
 Most popular tweets on X (formerly Twitter) as of 2023, by number of likes
(in millions)

content.source_3:
Elon Musk Beats Out Rihanna For Most-Liked Tweet Of 2023
Topline
A meme posted by Elon Musk on Twitter, the platform he owns, is the most-liked tweet so far this year, beating out Rihanna and Taylor Swift.
 Elon Musk has the most-liked tweet of 2023 so far.
 Copyright 2023 The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
 Key Facts
The image‚Äîwhich reads, ‚Äúpeople who have Twitter but never post anything‚Äù‚Äîfeatures a man smoking and overlooking a vast field of people, who appear to be interacting with one another.
 Musk‚Äôs tweet received more than 1.5 million likes and over 128,000 retweets in just under a month (he posted it June 17).
 Rihanna‚Äîwho tweeted a photo of her 1-year-old son RZA from a photoshoot with British Vogue‚Äîscored over 1.3 million likes.
 Another image posted by Musk featuring his dog Floki‚Äîwho appears to be signing paperwork to become ‚Äúthe new CEO of Twitter‚Äù‚Äîis the third-most-liked tweet, followed by atweet from Swift announcing the re-recording of her 2010 album Speak Now, after the album‚Äôs release was teased by Swift during her ‚ÄúEras Tour‚Äù earlier this year.
Demar Hamlin, the Buffalo Bills player who suffered cardiac arrest during a regular season game in January, received over 1 million likes for a tweet four days after the incident saying he was ‚Äúthankful for everyone who has reached out and prayed.‚Äù
 Most Likes
Surprising Fact
A March 17 tweet from Calvin Klein announcing a collaboration with BTS member Jungkook received the most retweets, with 329,922 retweets. Three of the other top five posts with the most retweets involved BTS, including two songannouncements and another tweet promoting Jungkook‚Äôs Calvin Klein collaboration.

It is currently the number 1 tweet of all time, with 6.7 million likes.
 The most liked tweet of all time ‚Äì RIP Chadwick Boseman
Barack Obama | 3.8 million likes
 As mentioned above, Elon Musk‚Äôs Coca-Cola tweet is the second most liked Twitter post. But that aside, the next on this list is a tweet by former US President Barack Obama.
 With 3.8 million likes, this poignant message from Obama rings true for people globally.
 The most liked tweet of Barack Obama
Greta Thunberg | 3.7 million likes
Activist Greta Thunberg‚Äôs scathing reply to Andrew Tate‚Äôs provocation on Twitter is next with 3.7 million likes.
 This post quickly went viral, thanks to the well-aimed humor and sarcasm.
 One of the most liked tweet of all time by Greta Thunberg
Joe Biden | 3.7 million likes
US President Joe Biden‚Äôs tweet on his inaugural day as the President of the United States of America comes in next with 3.7 million likes.
 The positive tweet from President Biden saw a lot of interaction and engagement on Twitter.
 The most liked tweet of Joe Biden
Barack Obama | 3.5 million likes
Again on this list is Barack Obama‚Äôs tribute to the sad demise of Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna in a tragic helicopter crash.
 This post resonated with everyone globally, particularly Basketball fans who were heartbroken at this tragedy.
 The most liked tweet of all time by Barack Obama
Why should you find your most liked tweets?
Having information about your most liked tweets can help you build your profile and followers on Twitter. You understand your post, its visibility and reach, and what to amplify or discontinue.
